siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, This week Stan took a field trip to try out It’s Just Wings. Stan enjoys the wings with Joe, listener to the show. He starts off with smoked buffalo wings as a baseline. Listen in for his reactions, but we think he’ll be back to try the fried Oreos. Next up we talk…

frontmatter.title: Don't Get Wing Sauce on your iPhone 12
